name: Monkey Punches (Alpha)
description:
MONKEY PUNCHES

A Proof of Concept sidescrolling beat-em-up game where you control an adorable ape hell-bent on delivering Jeff Bezos a knuckle sandwich. Developed as a Media Arts Senior Thesis by Connor Mitchell and Vee Curry.

Features:

2.5D Movement - WASD and SPACE BAR

Combat - press 'O' to punch

Animated Environment

Music and Sound Effects

Art and Animation by Vee Curry

Programming and Sound by Connor Mitchell
